item.title: XRP Price Regains Bullish Momentum; Time to Surpass $1?

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Breaking: Société Générale’s Crypto Division FORGE Secures the First French Crypto License
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
One of France’s largest commercial banks – Société Générale – has managed to secure the first French crypto license for its crypto division FORGE. The latest development shows that SG FORGE obtained the AMF license on Tuesday, July 18. Thus, the crypto division can now offer services like the purchase/sale of digital assets with legal

The post Breaking: Société Générale’s Crypto Division FORGE Secures the First French Crypto License appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
One of France’s largest commercial banks – Société Générale – has managed to secure the first French crypto license for its crypto division FORGE. The latest development shows that SG FORGE obtained the AMF license on Tuesday, July 18. Thus, the crypto division can now offer services like the purchase/sale of digital assets with legal

item.title: Pro-XRP Lawyer Explains Adapted Howey Test “Torres Doctrine” To Crypto Industry
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Judge Analisa Torres’ landmark decision in the Ripple vs US SEC has established the “Torres Doctrine”, a precedent that will restrict the application of the US Supreme Court’s Howey Test to modern-day blockchain technology. Many lawyers and politicians respected Judge Torres’s ruling in the most crucial case for not just the XRP community but for

item.title: Bitcoin Price May Dip To $28.5k; Here’s How To Trade Week Ahead
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
The leading cryptocurrency, Bitcoin is hovering above $30,000 following a brief dip to $29,592 on Monday. Ripple’s partial win in the SEC lawsuit was positive for the crypto market in general, but failed to trigger interest across the market, culminating in Bitcoin giving back the gains above $31,000. Analysts and industry experts are attributing Bitcoin’s failed movement above

item.description:
